pathAssistantSteps.info:
What is happening:

  • The Sales Agreement is in the midst of processing (Customer Signing / Approving / Endorsing)
  • The Used Car Purchase Agreement Envelope is in the midst of processing (If Any)


What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • Refer to the Docusign status on the progress of the envelopes (All)

What is happening:

  • Sales Agreement has been cancelled

What is happening:

  • Car has been collected


What needs to be done at this stage (Optional):

  • Post Car Collection Survey - QR Code (Sales Consultant)
  • Defect Form (Sales Consultant) - If Applicable

What is happening:

  • Sales Agreement process has been completed - DSA will be locked


What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • COE Details Synchronisation from VSMS
  • Car Allocation Synchronisation from VSMS

What is happening:

  • Sales Agreement has just been created
  • Sales Order Number will be synced from VSMS once an envelope has been successfully generated


What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • Please confirm that all information inside DSA is correct before generating (Sales Consultant)
  • Complete the DSA Form (Sales Consultant)

What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • Upload Cover Note (Insurance)
  • Car Registration Number Synchronisation from VSMS


What needs to be done at this stage (Optional):

  • Upload Release Letter (Finance)
  • Collect Balance Payment (BSD)

What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • Issue Vehicle Delivery Certificate (Sales Consultant)

What needs to be done at this stage (Mandatory):

  • Verify & Confirm Insurance Premium with Customer (Insurance)
  • Input & Confirm Registration Date with Customer (Sales Consultant)
  • Balance Payment Email (Sales Consultant)


What needs to be done at this stage (Optional):

  • Upload Used Car Full Settlement Letter (Sales Consultant)
  • Confirm Used Car Full Settlement Amount with Customer - within 3 days before Balance Payment (Sales Consultant)
  • Upload GMS Documents (Sales Consultant)
